scripts.deploy: npm run build:serverless && cd serverless && sls deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build:serverless && npm run final:deploy:production
scripts.logs: cd serverless && sls logs --stage dev -f receive --startTime 2h
scripts.logs:subscribe: cd serverless && sls logs --stage dev -f list-subscribe --startTime 2h
scripts.logs:list:receive: cd serverless && sls logs --stage dev -f list-receive --startTime 2h
scripts.logs:unsubscribe: cd serverless && sls logs --stage dev -f list-unsubscribe --startTime 2h
scripts.logs:verify: cd serverless && sls logs --stage dev -f verify-subscriber --startTime 2h
scripts.logs:production: cd serverless && sls logs --stage production -f receive --startTime 12h
